## SimpleProduct.canonical\_url property

Relative canonical URL. This value is returned only if the system setting 'Use Canonical Link Meta Tag For Products' is enabled

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
canonical_url?: Maybe<Scalars['String']>;
```
